document.full_text: a jihadist group in the gaza strip aligned with al qaeda threatened on thursday to execute an abducted italian it is holding within hours, unless hamas islamists release the group's leader.
document.title: gaza group threatens to execute abducted italian
lines_and_colors: a jihadist group in the gaza strip aligned with al qaeda threatened on thursday to execute an abducted italian it is holding within hours, unless hamas islamists release the group's leader.
